amendment.description: Amendment requires that none of the funds in this act may be used by Amtrak to provide free alcohol.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part A of House Report 111-219 to require that none of the funds in this act may be used by Amtrak to provide free alcohol.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton (IN) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
